page.title: 18Building Survey
page.content:
Draw your own conclusions!Total sample 53 houses.
Walls:brick 38,stone 6,wood 0,cobbled 0,pebble dash 9.
Roof:slate 38,tiles 14,thatch 0,concrete 1,flat 0,chimney 35.
Windows:wood 50,stone 1,double glazed 14,metal 1,plastic 3,angled 6,sash 5.
Outbuildings and amenities:garage 41, shed 36,stables 7,barn 9,front garden 51,rear garden 49,workshop 8,extention 22,telephone 47,T.V.aerial 43,courtyard 5,greenhouse 2,gas central heating 7, patio doors 3,outside toilet 3,inside toilet 53,outhouse 3,conservatory 2. What does this tell you about our area?
